about_the_game:
An exciting tower defense game where you have to defend your people from the invasion of enemy forces.
Your task is to build and upgrade cannons to fend off waves of attacking enemies.
Place defensive structures on the island and don't let the enemies penetrate your territory!
Your strategic thinking and ability to effectively utilize resources will be key in this fight for survival.

Features:

3D Graphics
Five types of towers: You have access to five different types of towers for defense. Each tower has its unique characteristics. Choose wisely to effectively deal with enemies.
Variety of enemies: The game offers a variety of enemies.
Strategic thinking: Place towers to cover the most vulnerable points and effectively hold back the enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent scenes and elements of disdain or hatred towards certain groups of people.

name: Defense of the Sodomites

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
